cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DM, cs.IT. 

The paper discusses learning the structure of dynamic systems, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also deals with the problem of discovering hidden variables, which is related to the field of statistical inference, making cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) a likely sub-category as well. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel approximation scheme, which falls under the category of optimization and algorithms, making cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with the computational aspects of learning, which is related to information theory, making cs.IT (Information Theory) a possible sub-category.
